name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an AI Architect with 8 years of experience, I excel in designing and implementing scalable AI solutions using technologies such as **Azure**, **Azure AI**, **Azure AI Foundry**, **Azure AI Search**, **C#**, **Python**, and **TypeScript**. My background in full-stack development enables me to effectively integrate AI capabilities using frameworks like **LangChain** and **Semantic Kernel** to create intelligent applications. I have extensive experience with **CI/CD** practices, ensuring seamless deployment and integration of AI models into existing systems.
I bring significant expertise in **MLOps**, leveraging tools such as **Terraform**, **Bicep**, **Docker**, and **AKS** to automate provisioning and manage infrastructure as code. My strong foundation in building and deploying machine learning pipelines includes the use of platforms like **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Additionally, I am proficient in **Azure CLI** and **PowerShell**, which enhances my ability to manage cloud resources efficiently. I am committed to maintaining compliance with industry standards while delivering high-performance solutions tailored to the healthcare and financial sectors. My communication skills allow me to articulate complex concepts effectively, collaborating with stakeholders to drive innovation.
